STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Cook like a pro with our intuitive app
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from the culinary creators who love our app
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has revolutionized my meal prep game! The recipes are delicious and easy to follow.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a professional chef, I'm always impressed by the depth of knowledge and creativity in the app's recipes. A must-have tool!
TESTIMONIAL_GIVER_2_DESCRIPTION_PLACEHOL: Executive Chef at Michelin Star Restaurant
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has made cooking fun again for my family. The kids love getting involved and trying new dishes.
FAQ_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Learn More About Our Cooking App
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to commonly asked questions
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What can I do with this cooking app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app provides a vast collection of recipes, step-by-step instructions, and helpful cooking tips to make delicious meals at home. You can search for recipes, save your favorites, and even create custom meal plans.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Is the app free to download and use?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Yes, the app is free to download and use. However, some premium features like advanced recipe filters or exclusive content may require a paid subscription.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I adjust recipes for different dietary needs?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Absolutely! Our app allows you to filter recipes based on various dietary preferences and restrictions, such as vegan, gluten-free, low-carb, and more. You can also adjust serving sizes or ingredient amounts to suit your needs.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: How often are new recipes added?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Our team of culinary experts and recipe curators continuously add new and exciting recipes to the app on a regular basis. You'll always have fresh culinary inspiration at your fingertips!
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Can I share recipes with friends or family?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Yes, our app includes a handy share feature that allows you to easily send recipes via email, messaging apps, or social media platforms. Spread the joy of cooking with your loved ones!
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Discover delicious recipes and cook like a pro with our user-friendly app.
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Elevate your culinary skills with step-by-step guidance, personalized recipes, and a world of flavors at your fingertips.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_FOOTER_TEXT_1: Learn to cook like a pro
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: Discover delicious recipes and learn new cooking techniques with CookingPal, your ultimate companion in the kitchen. Join our community of passionate home cooks today!
FEATURE_1_BODY: Browse thousands of recipes across different cuisines and dietary preferences. Find new favorites with just a few taps.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Detailed instructions with photos and videos make cooking a breeze, even for complex dishes. Never feel lost in the kitchen again.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Automatically generate shopping lists based on your chosen recipes. Stay organized and never forget an ingredient.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Create weekly meal plans tailored to your dietary needs and schedule. Stay on track with your health goals.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Keep all your recipe timers in one place. Get notified when to start the next step for perfectly timed dishes.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Share your culinary creations with friends and family. Get inspiration from our vibrant food community.
CTA_BODY: Elevate your cooking game with our app that empowers you to craft delectable dishes right from your kitchen. Discover new flavors, master techniques, and ignite your passion for culinary artistry.
HERO_SUBTITLE: Discover delicious recipes, plan meals, and cook like a pro.
CONTACT_FORM_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get in Touch with Our Culinary Experts
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Let us help bring your culinary vision to life

PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Everything You Need to Know About FoodMaker
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: FoodMaker is a revolutionary app that simplifies the cooking process. With its user-friendly interface and innovative features, FoodMaker empowers you to create delicious meals with ease.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Simply input your dietary preferences, favorite ingredients, and desired cuisine type, and FoodMaker will suggest recipes tailored to your needs. It also provides step-by-step instructions, helpful tips, and substitution recommendations.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: FoodMaker stands out with its advanced recipe recommendation algorithm, extensive database of recipes from around the world, and seamless integration with smart kitchen appliances for a truly connected cooking experience.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Is FoodMaker suitable for all skill levels?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Absolutely! Whether you're a seasoned chef or a beginner cook, FoodMaker caters to all skill levels with its intuitive interface and detailed instructions, making cooking enjoyable and accessible for everyone.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Our app helps you plan, shop for ingredients, and easily follow recipes to create mouthwatering dishes right in your kitchen.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Explore a vast collection of recipes from around the world and find new favorites to expand your culinary horizons.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Get customized recipe recommendations based on your dietary preferences, favorite ingredients, and cooking skill level.
